prompt.subject_and_pose: A realistic vertical photo of a beautiful young Japanese woman lying prone on her stomach in bed, facing away from the camera. Her head is turned to the left, resting comfortably on a grey pillow. She has platinum blonde hair pulled up into a messy high bun with a hair clip. Her pose is relaxed, showing her bare back and shoulders. She has an athletic full hourglass figure.
prompt.outfit: She is wearing white lace underwear. She is topless, with her back fully exposed.
prompt.environment: The setting is a casual bedroom. The bed has messy, rumpled white or light grey sheets. A black television remote control lies on the mattress next to her torso. There is a plush, grey and white faux-fur throw blanket bunched up near her hips and legs. A dark headboard is visible behind her, and a window with closed horizontal blinds is in the upper right background.
prompt.lighting_and_shot: Natural afternoon lighting coming from the window on the right, creating high-contrast strips of light and shadow across the bedsheets and the subject's body. The lighting highlights the texture of the blanket and the curve of the back. The shot is a medium-close candid angle, taken from slightly above bed level, with a realistic, unpolished phone-camera aesthetic.
